amendment.description: Page 62, after line 2, insert the following: SEC. 609. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Department of Energy to move the Office of Environmental Management under the authority of the Under Secretary for Nuclear Security of the Department of Energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Energy to move the Office of Environmental Management under the authority of the Under Secretary for Nuclear Security of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
